text:
How to find the measure of an individual angle when given the sum of interior angles

\begin{aligned}\n&\begin{array}{l}\nI=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} \\\n1260^{\circ}\n\end{array}\\\n&4\n\end{aligned}[imath]I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} [/imath] [imath]1260^{\circ}[/imath]
